message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.CV, cs.CL

The paper proposes a novel recommendation system that uses Monte Carlo Tree Search to estimate the values of hero combinations in a combinatorial game. This involves modeling the drafting between two teams, which suggests that the paper could belong to the Game Theory (cs.GT) sub-category. Additionally, the use of machine learning techniques such as MCTS suggests that the paper could belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The paper also mentions the design of heroes, which could involve Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) techniques.
